fsType.description: fsType is filesystem type to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs". Implicitly inferred to be "ext4" if unspecified.

storagePolicyID.description: storagePolicyID is the storage Policy Based Management (SPBM) profile ID associated with the StoragePolicyName.

storagePolicyName.description: storagePolicyName is the storage Policy Based Management (SPBM) profile name.

volumePath.description: volumePath is the path that identifies vSphere volume vmdk
